info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 03 at 6:44PM MDT until June 03 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM MDT FOR DE BACA...NORTH CENTRAL CHAVES AND SOUTH CENTRAL GUADALUPE COUNTIES... At 644 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles south of Fort Sumner, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fort Sumner, Taiban and Yeso. This includes Highway 60 between Mile Markers 290 and 345. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
